text: flma tarakt alttayifat alty aetdt fi yawm alsabt ma dhukkirt bh, waistamarat ealaa ghyiha waetdayha fyh, walam tastajib lamaa waeazatha bih alttayifat alwaezt, anja allah aladhin yanhawn ean mesyth, wa'akhadh aladhin aetdawa fi yawm alsabt bieadhab 'alim shdyd; bsbb mkhalfthm 'amr allah wkhrwjhm ean taeth
